column4: hello need help when boot ubuntu, there's error say : mount filesystem failed press control D and when i enter shell using root , i can't config anything with fstab or "/ " coz it say file system read only how i can fix it?? thx

hello need help when boot ubuntu, there's error say : mount filesystem failed press control D and when i enter shell using root , i can't config anything with fstab or "/ " coz it say file system read only how i can fix it?? thx
No way... you must not use fsck on a mounted system! You need to unmount it first or if you can't, use a Live CD
